JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Are You Ready to Lead and Elevate Every Guest Experience? Join Our Team as a Flux Manager at FLUX!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Tir Na Nog is seeking a passionate and dynamic leader to step into the role of Flux Manager at FLUX! If you thrive in a fast-paced environment, are driven by excellent service, and love inspiring teams to deliver memorable guest experiences, we want to hear from you! 

About Us

FLUX, located in the heart of Aarhus, is a vibrant and family-friendly gastropub food lounge and restaurant. We take pride in serving hearty, delicious meals in a relaxed atmosphere where guests of all ages feel welcome. 

By night, FLUX transforms into a lively bar, offering craft cocktails, beers, and wines. At Tir Na Nog, our motto is simple: a friendly staff who care leads to long-lasting memories. This commitment to excellent service drives us, and we are passionate about fostering a strong, supportive team culture. 

What We’re Looking For

We’re seeking a motivated and experienced leader ready to take FLUX to the next level. You’ll thrive in this role if you: 

  • Have proven experience in hospitality management, including restaurant and kitchen operations.
  • Are passionate about food, guest service, and creating unforgettable dining experiences.
  • Bring creative ideas to grow revenue and elevate guest satisfaction.
  • Possess strong leadership and communication skills, inspiring and training staff to achieve excellence.
  • Demonstrate a solution-oriented mindset and the ability to manage challenges effectively.
  • Have experience in management, scheduling, and workflow optimization.
  • Are hands-on and ready to lead by example, actively participating in daily operations.
  • Understand the importance of budgeting, planning, and team development.

Your Key Responsibilities

  • Deliver Unforgettable Guest Experiences: Ensure every guest leaves with lasting memories through personal engagement and a focus on quality.
  • Lead and Inspire Your Team: Motivate and guide a talented staff in both the dining area and kitchen.
  • Oversee Operations: Manage daily operations, staff coordination, and workflow efficiency.
  • Train and Develop Staff: Recruit, onboard, and coach employees to maintain high hospitality standards.
  • Ensure Compliance: Maintain hygiene, safety, and operational excellence in line with regulations.
  • Contribute to Business Growth: Develop marketing strategies, events, and promotions to grow revenue and expand FLUX’s reach.

Why Join FLUX?

  • Be part of a growing, passionate team delivering excellence in food and service.
  • Bring your creativity and ideas to life in a dynamic environment.
  • Lead a supportive, talented team in a workplace where every day brings new opportunities.
  • Help build a restaurant that guests love to visit and talk about.

 

Ready to Apply?

If you’re ready to bring your leadership, passion, and energy to FLUX, we’d love to hear from you! Submit your CV and a brief cover letter to jobs@tirnanog.dk telling us why you’re the perfect fit. 

For any questions, feel free to reach out. We can’t wait to welcome you to the FLUX family!
